file_content.text: I have the men preparing to disembark, my lord. We will be joining the fight for Corellia immediately.
The men are raring to get to Corellia.
General, the men are getting antsy.
Somebody already knocked the pirate presence here down to nearly nil. There's no pressing military need on Hoth anymore.
We got geared up for Corellia, where the real fighting is. Instead, we're protecting these caves from wampas?
I understand, Captain, believe me. Try to keep the men in line and battle-ready.
I have to assume our greater purpose here will be revealed. The order to hole up came from the highest authority.
I'm here to rescind that order, General. You must take Armageddon Battalion to Corellia immediately.
My orders are from Darth Baras himself. On whose authority are you operating?
I will not be questioned.
My own. [Kill Greist]
Darth Baras won't be in charge for long. When he goes down, those who followed him will be judged accordingly.
His days are numbered.
General, I served under you at the Cleansing of Nopsin.
I remember you, Pierce. Also remember promoting Phenter here instead of you.
Made the right decision. I'd never be satisfied riding your coattails. Some friendly advice--people who don't listen to my lord end up dead.
I don't respond well to threats.
I will kill you, General. And down the chain of command until someone in Armageddon Battalion does as I say.
Well, here's another.
We need generals who do.
Wrong answer. [Kill Greist]
Now, Captain, I'll say it one more time. Armageddon Battalion is to report to Darth Vowrawn on Corellia immediately.
Your life can either end right now in this frozen cave, or you can deliver the glory of taking Corellia.
Are you a soldier or a coward?
The war needs you, Greist. Your assignment here is an error the Empire may not recover from.
Corellia will be lost.
You put me in a bad position, my lord. Disobeying the Dark Council is equivalent to treason.
General, we've been in a lot of scrapes. Does this feel right to you? What could possibly make this block of ice more important than Corellia?
Know your place, Captain. No matter what our gut says, we're not privy to Darth Baras's ultimate tactics.
Listen to the captain, Greist. Deep down, you know he's right.
Trust your gut.
Baras is serving himself at the expense of the Empire.
He's out for personal gain.
Soldiers are dying while you sit on your hands.
Captain....
Yes, General.
Make ready the men. We're moving out for Corellia.
Yes, sir!
There, Sith. Happy now?
Time will tell, Greist. You'll see you did the right thing.
You'll thank me later.
You've made me and your men happy, General.
Quite.
Your attitude could still land you dead, General.
Watch your tone.
Now, get moving.
Captain, you're in charge. One more time--take Armageddon Battalion to Darth Vowrawn on Corellia immediately.
Time's up. [Kill Greist]
Uh, yes, right away, my lord.
Men, make ready. We're packing up for Corellia!
Time's up. [Kill Greist]
